name: budgetcargo
description: BudgetCargo - Logistics platform for UK-Malawi shipping

scripts.build: shx rm -rf public && shx mkdir -p public && shx cp index.html public/index.html && shx cp styles.css public/styles.css && shx cp app.js public/app.js && shx cp admin.html public/admin.html && shx cp admin.js public/admin.js && shx cp login.html public/login.html && shx cp login.js public/login.js && shx cp -r api public/api

author: BudgetCargo
